hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# BASE=/home/dbox GIT=$BASE/jobsub SERVER=`hostname` SOURCE_ME=/tmp/jobsub_test_env_$$ echo "export X509_USER_CERT=$BASE/.globus/dbox.digicert.cert.pem" > $SOURCE_ME echo "export X509_USER_KEY=$BASE/.globus/dbox.digicert.decrypted.key.pem" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export GROUP=darkside" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export SKIP_PRODUCTION_TEST=YES" >> $SOURCE_ME echo "export SKIP_CDF_TEST=YES" >> $SOURCE_ME
cd $GIT/test/client sudo -u dbox ./integration_test.sh $SERVER $SOURCE_ME RSLT=$? if [ "$RSLT" = "0" ]; then rm $SOURCE_ME fi exit $RSLT
